name: Block Wrestling Mania 3D - FREE Endless Wrestle Game in Cube world
name_original: Block Wrestling Mania 3D - FREE Endless Wrestle Game in Cube world
description:
-- Let's get ready to RumbleEEEEE! -- FREE FREE FREE
Bring your Superstar or Chuck Norris to win the belt! Attack with CATS, GOATS and Crafts!
Immersive and ridicoulus gameplay and massively addictive Wrestling game!

FEATURES
- 50+ unique superstars!
- 30+ special attacks like: Goat Rush, ThunderBolt, Goat Milk Attack and so on!
- Endless replay option!
- GameCenter to compete your friends!
- Social sharing functions!
- Cats, Goats and Crafts!

Coming soon:
- Local and Worldwide multiplayer!
- New locations in every update!
- More Special attacks
- More Skins!

Get It and tell your friends!

Have FUN!
